import React from 'react' import styles from './Css_Modules/Form.module.css' import styled from 'styled-components' import { useState } from 'react' import { validate } from './validantion.js' const Div = styled.div` display:flex; justify-content: center; height:440px; ` const Form = ({login}) => { const [userData, setUserData] = useState({email:"",password:""}) const [errors, setErrors] = useState({}) const handleChange = (event) =>{ setErrors(validate({...userData,[event.target.name]:event.target.value})) setUserData({...userData,[event.target.name]:event.target.value}) } const handleSubmit = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() login(userData) } return (

Login

{errors.email}

{errors.password}

) } export default Form
